channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- Pixel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- Pixel

item.title: CVE-2017-6275|2024-08-05T15:25:48.744Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- pixel
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the Thermal Driver, where a missing bounds checking in the thermal driver could allow a read from an arbitrary kernel address. This issue is rated as moderate. Product: Pixel. Versions: N/A. Android ID: A-34702397. References: N-CVE-2017-6275.

item.title: CVE-2017-6274|2024-08-05T15:25:48.687Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- pixel
item.description: An elevation of Privilege vulnerability exists in the Thermal Driver, where a missing bounds checks in the thermal throttle driver can cause an out-of-bounds write in the kernel. This issue is rated as moderate. Product: Pixel. Version: N/A. Android ID: A-34705801. References: N-CVE-2017-6274.
